New Records: The Cleveland Cavaliers became the fourth team in NBA history to win their first 15 games of the season.
Key Match Events: Ty Jerome posted 24 points and 8 assists on 9-15 shooting in the win against the Charlotte Hornets.
The Garland and Jerome pairing continues to work well, contributing to a 130.6 offensive rating and a 21.2 net rating when both are on the floor.
Post-Match Reflections: Evan Mobley praised Ty Jerome's performance, stating 'He stepped up tonight. I think he did a great job overall.'
Kenny Atkinson commented on Jerome's importance, saying 'He is one of our best players right now. It’s always nice having another ball handler out there so DG doesn’t get worn out.'
Miscellaneous Highlights: Isaac Okoro and Dean Wade left the game with ankle injuries, with no update on their return postgame.
